author: larryi
msg: Make setProperty with param="..." not set the property if the parameter
is empty.
Modify introspect() to allow introspecthelper() to decide whether to set or
not set the property since it can tell if the property is an array or not.

author: costin
msg: Renamed the 2 interceptors involved in session management, to avoid future
confusions.
I'll integrate the changes from 3.2, using the right file ( i.e.
modules.session.SessionId for cookie/url ID extraction, SessionStore
for managing the HttpSession objects ).
The original files are still there, as a backup - will be removed as soon
as the patches from 3.2 are integrated.

author: pierred
msg: Fix for bug report #412:
public void removeAttribute(String name) does not work properly
- removeAttribute now removes the attribute from the 4 scopes.
- REQUEST_SCOPE now handled properly.
PR:
Obtained from:
Submitted by:

author: craigmcc
msg: Intra-document references (i.e. relative urls starting with "#") never
need to be encoded.

author: larryi
msg: Apply Gareth Morgan's patch for value="", but don't allow setProperty with
param="..." to set the property if parameter is empty.
Modify introspect() to allow introspecthelper() to decide whether to set or
not set the property since it can tell if the property is an array or not.
